description: This source file defines extension methods for configuring Swagger (using NSwag) in a C# ASP.NET Core project, specifically adding JWT security scheme and API metadata.

classes.name: SwaggerExtensions
classes.description: A static class providing extension methods to configure Swagger in the application.

methods.name: AddOceanSwagger
methods.description: An extension method to add and configure OpenAPI/Swagger documentation with JWT security scheme for the ASP.NET Core IServiceCollection.
